query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(payConditionText) FROM PayConditionText as payConditionText WHERE payConditionText.payConditionId = ?1 and payConditionText.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Language as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 ORDER BY a.languageName
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Language as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 and a.isDefault = TRUE

query.description: This finder is used to recover the languages by languageIso attributte, the Iso value is stored in systemconstant table the constant type is 'SYSTEMLANGUAGE'.
query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Language as a WHERE a.languageIso = ?1 and a.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Language as a, LangText as b WHERE b.companyId = ?1 AND b.langTextId = ?2 AND a.languageId = b.languageId
SELECT OBJECT(l) FROM Language as l WHERE l.companyId = ?1 AND l.languageIso is not null
SELECT OBJECT(l) FROM Language as l WHERE l.companyId = ?1 AND l.languageName = ?2

SELECT OBJECT(categoryRelation) FROM CategoryRelation as categoryRelation WHERE categoryRelation.companyId = ?2 AND categoryRelation.categoryValueId =?1 ORDER BY categoryRelation.category.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM City c WHERE c.country.countryId=?1 and c.country.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM City as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM City as c WHERE c.cityZip=?1 AND c.countryId=?2 AND c.companyId=?3
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM City as c WHERE c.cityName=?1 AND c.countryId=?2 AND c.companyId=?3 AND c.cityZip IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM City as c WHERE c.cityZip=?1 AND c.cityName=?2 AND c.countryId=?3 AND c.companyId=?4
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Currency as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Currency as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 and a.isBasicCurrency = TRUE
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Salutation as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Salutation as a WHERE a.salutationLabel = ?1 and a.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Bank as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PersonType as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Priority as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 and a.type = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Priority as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Priority as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 and a.type='SUPPORT' ORDER BY a.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Branch as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Branch as a WHERE a.branchName = ?1 and a.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PayCondition as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM PayMorality as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Title as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Title as a WHERE a.titleName =?1 and a.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM LangText as a, Language as b WHERE a.langTextId = ?1 AND a.languageId = b.languageId
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM LangText as a WHERE a.langTextId = ?1 ORDER BY a.language.languageName
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM LangText as a, Language as b WHERE a.langTextId = ?1 AND a.languageId = b.languageId AND b.languageIso =?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM LangText as a WHERE a.languageId = ?1 AND a.type = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM LangText as a WHERE a.langTextId = ?1 AND a.isDefault = true
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Country as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Country as a WHERE a.countryName=?1 AND a.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE (a.categoryGroupId=?1 or a.secondGroupId =?1) and a.companyId = ?2 ORDER BY a.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE a.parentCategory =?1 and a.companyId = ?2 ORDER BY a.sequence ASC

SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE a.table =?1 and a.companyId = ?2 and a.categoryType <> 8 and a.categoryType <> 9 and a.hasSubCategories = false and a.parentCategory is null ORDER BY a.sequence ASC

SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 and a.categoryType <> 8 and a.categoryType <> 9 and a.hasSubCategories = false and a.parentCategory is null and (a.table = '4' or a.table ='5') ORDER BY a.sequence ASC

SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1 and a.categoryType <> 8 and a.categoryType <> 9 and a.hasSubCategories = false and a.parentCategory is null and (a.table = '2' or a.table ='5') ORDER BY a.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM Category as b WHERE b.table= ?1 and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM Category as b WHERE (b.table= ?1 or b.table =?2) and b.companyId=?3
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Category as a
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM Category as c WHERE c.fieldIdentifier= ?1 and c.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM Template as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AddressSource as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM AddressSource as a WHERE a.addressSourceName = ?1 and a.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CategoryValue as a WHERE a.categoryId = ?1 ORDER BY a.categoryValueName ASC
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CategoryValue as a WHERE a.categoryId = ?1 and a.categoryValueName = ?2 and a.companyId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CustomerType as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(c) FROM CustomerType as c WHERE c.customerTypeName = ?1 and c.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM CostCencer as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(a) FROM SupplierType as a WHERE a.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM TemplateText as t WHERE t.templateId = ?1 AND t.byDefault=true
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM TemplateText as t WHERE t.freeTextId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM ProductType as p WHERE p.productTypeType = ?1 AND p.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM Vat as t WHERE t.companyId = ?1 order by t.vatId asc
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM Vat as t WHERE t.vatLabel = ?1 and t.companyId = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(p) FROM ProductUnit as p WHERE p.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM VatRate as t WHERE t.vatId = ?1 ORDER BY t.validFrom ASC
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.categoryId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.categoryId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2 and b.categoryValueId is not null

SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.categoryId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2 and (b.dateValue is not null or b.decimalValue is not null or b.integerValue is not null or b.stringValue is not null or b.categoryValueId is not null)
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.productId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.processId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.customerId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.addressId = ?1 and b.contactPersonId IS NULL and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.addressId = ?1 and b.contactPersonId=?2 and b.companyId=?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.attachId = ?1 and b.companyId =?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.addressId = ?1 and b.contactPersonId IS NULL and b.companyId =?2 and b.categoryValueId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.productId = ?1 and b.companyId =?2 and b.categoryValueId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.processId = ?1 and b.companyId =?2 and b.categoryValueId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.salePositionId = ?1 and b.companyId =?2 and b.categoryValueId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.customerId = ?1 and b.companyId =?2 and b.categoryValueId = ?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.addressId = ?1 and b.contactPersonId =?2 and b.companyId = ?3 and b.categoryValueId = ?4
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.addressId = ?1 and b.contactPersonId IS NULL and b.categoryId =?2 and b.companyId=?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.addressId = ?1 and b.contactPersonId = ?2 and b.categoryId =?3 and b.companyId=?4
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.customerId = ?1 and b.categoryId =?2 and b.companyId =?3
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CategoryFieldValue as b WHERE b.salePositionId = ?1 and b.companyId=?2
SELECT OBJECT(b) FROM CampaignType as b WHERE b.companyId = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(group) FROM CategoryGroup as group WHERE group.categoryTabId = ?1 and group.companyId = ?2 ORDER BY group.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(group) FROM CategoryGroup as group WHERE group.table = ?1 and group.companyId = ?2 and group.categoryTabId is null ORDER BY group.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(tab) FROM CategoryTab as tab WHERE tab.table = ?1 and tab.companyId = ?2 ORDER BY tab.sequence ASC
SELECT OBJECT(t) FROM TemplateTextImg AS t WHERE t.templateId=?1 and t.languageId=?2
SELECT p.webParameterId FROM WebParameter AS p WHERE p.webDocumentId = ?1
